item.title: Encrypted Vm Yum Update
item.description: After running “yum update” on a encrypted VM run yumupdatefix.sh to rebuild the initramfs with the patched version of the Dracut module. If you do not do that your VM will not be able to boot.

item.title: Mount Blobs With Dysk
item.description: With dysk you can create disks and attach disks quickly on your VM using storage blobs. curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/johanburati/bin/master/dysk.ko.$(uname -r) -o dysk.ko sudo cp dysk.4.13.0-17-generic.ko /lib/modules/$(uname -r)/kernel/drivers/misc/dysk.ko

item.title: Redhat Recommendations for Azure
item.description: The following are recommendation from Redhat for VMs running in Microsoft Azure. Option Recommendation LVM Do not use Logical Volume Manager (LVM) on the operating system disk. Use regular partitions and format the disk using ext3, ext4, or xfs. LVM or RAID can be used for data disks. ssh ssh must be enabled to provide remote access to your Azure VMs. dhcp The primary virtual adapter should be configured for dhcp (IPv4 only).
